About Team Winter Wonderland News Brewing Arts Jobs For Good For Ty Giving Back Craft Beverages Beverage Finder Draft Cans Kegs RetroChill Our Beer History Store Merchandise Gift Cards RetroChill Whiskey Music & Events St. Pete Clearwater Food St. Pete Clearwater Tasting Room St. Pete (Original) Clearwater Beach Rental Space Contact About Our beers. Our passion. Our story. How many beers does it take to put three daughters through college? In the beginning, it all started with two questions for Leigh and Mike Harting. 1)Does craft beer really make a better beer-battered fish? 2)How are we going to put our 3 Daughters to college? While operating a successful restaurant in St. Petersburg, FL, Mike and his head chief Ty Weaver, were working on a recipe for a craft beer battered fish and decided to make it with their own hand-crafted brews. To them, it was a lot like cooking - you follow a recipe, adjust to taste, and then hope everyone likes the final product. Mike, Leigh, and Ty decided it was pretty good, so they put some on tap. To their surprise, it wasn't just pretty good. It outsold every other beer they had. As they started brewing more and as the popularity of the beers grew, they decided to try to find a small but more advanced brewing system that would fit in the restaurant. Instead, they came upon an industrial-sized, 30-barrel brewhouse that took up more space than the entire dining room itself. Exasperated, Leigh looked at him and asked the all-important question: "How many beers do we have to sell to put to our three daughters through college?" And so, 3 Daughters Brewing was born, officially opening its doors in St. Petersburg in December of 2013 in a small 1600 square-foot tasting room. Mike worked hard on operations and funding, Ty used his unique experience to make amazing craft brews and Leigh jumped in the car and started selling 3 Daughters beer across the state of Florida. Fast forward to today and 3 Daughters Brewing has grown into one of the largest independent breweries in Florida. Our tasting room in St. Petersburg is one of (if not) the busiest tasting rooms in the state, often serving over 250,000 annually in our large warehouse that has turned into a major live entertainment venue. In March of 2022, we opened our second tasting room in Clearwater Beach with its own brewing system and amazing views of Clearwater Beach. In May of 2022, we also opened our first airport location inside of St.Pete-Clearwater International Airport serving over 2.4 million passengers annually. Thanks to Ty’s innovation and Mike’s drive we now also brew award-winning Beers, Ciders, Seltzers, Vodka+Soda Canned Cocktails, Energy Drinks, and Non-Alcoholic beverages (we also make our own honey). With Leigh always out selling our brands we are now found in every part of Florida from Key West to the Panhandle and from Jacksonville to Naples. You can also find 3 Daughters Brewing in every major retailer, amusement park, liquor store and most major restaurants throughout Florida. 3D GEAR NEWS Family. Beer. Community. At 3 Daughters Brewing, we care about three things above all else: crafting great beer, sharing that beer with our friends, and supporting our community. Whether you're having a pint in our Tasting Room, buying a six pack from the store, or trying us out on tap anywhere across Florida, you're a part of keeping that mission alive. We were founded by a group of friends and family who had known each other for decades, and all these years later, it's the same crew keeping one of Florida's largest independent and family-owned breweries moving along. Come by our Tasting Room any time in St. Petersburg, or find us in stores, restaurants and bars throughout Florida and beyond. Wherever you are, we toast to you. Drink Local. Drink Craft. Come by the tasting room at 222 22nd Street South, St. Petersburg, FL 33712. Our beers. Our passion. Our story. How many beers does it take to put three daughters through college? Come by the tasting room at 222 22nd Street South, St. Petersburg, FL 33712.

About Team Winter Wonderland News Brewing Arts Jobs For Good For Ty Giving Back Craft Beverages Beverage Finder Draft Cans Kegs RetroChill Our Beer History Store Merchandise Gift Cards RetroChill Whiskey Music & Events St. Pete Clearwater Food St. Pete Clearwater Tasting Room St. Pete (Original) Clearwater Beach Rental Space Contact Contact CONTACT The idea for 3 Daughters Brewing originated while Mike and Ty were working together at a local restaurant. Finding they had a passion for creating innovative craft beer and beverages, they decided to take brewing to the next level. 3 Daughters Brewing brews are constantly changing as quickly as we can dream them up. We are one of the fastest growing regional breweries and the largest independent brewery in Florida. Armed with experience, energy and enthusiasm, we believe in the importance of innovation, listening to our customer and supporting our company. Our portfolio is constantly expanding to meet consumer demands for quality craft beverages. We currently offer craft beer, hard cider, wine, sangria and Vodka+Soda canned cocktails. We enjoy what we do and we hope you do too. Contact: 727-495-6002 Address: 222 22nd Street South, St. Petersburg, FL 33712. * General Question Book an Event at the Brewery Offsite Events Donation Requests Book Your Band St. Pete Tasting Room Clearwater Tasting Room NAME * Phone * Email * Subject * Message * CAPTCHA Answers to our most common questions: Can we ship beer to you? Unfortunately it is against the law for us to ship alcoholic beverages, you can check out our beverage finder to see where you can find us ! Right now our craft beverages are found throughout Florida, everywhere from Sloppy Joe’s in Key West to the Publix’s in Jacksonville. We have over 4,500 locations to enjoy our tasty beverages! Am I able to purchase kegs from you? Yes, in fact we have a whole page setup here for you to learn how to do that. Are there really 3 Daughters? Of course, learn all about it on our about us page here . Do you have the most fun sales and marketing team? Since they built the most awesomeness website, they think so. EVENTS
Stop by for a Hand Crafted Beer & A SHOW
For us, it's not enough just to brew great beer. We want to enjoy that beer with our friends and celebrate the good times with our community. That's why we take advantage of all the space available to us at our brewery and use it for everything from trivia, yoga and bingo during the week, to live music, festivals and markets on the weekends. Whatever your preference, we've always got something going on in our Tasting Room.
Tasting Room
Events
Musical Bingo Nation
Thu Aug 28th, - 7:00 pm - 9:00 pm
Join us for Musical Bingo at 3 Daughters Brewing Free To Play Win Prizes Fun For Everyone Musical Bingo Nation is an entertainment company that provides musical bingo events throughout Florida & New England. With over 30 music rounds, you will always have a new one to try. We play the best music from the […]
Musical Bingo Nation
Thu Aug 28th, - 7:00 pm - 9:00 pm
Join us for Musical Bingo at 3 Daughters Brewing
Free To Play
Win Prizes
Fun For Everyone
Musical Bingo Nation is an entertainment company that provides musical bingo events throughout Florida & New England. With over 30 music rounds, you will always have a new one to try. We play the best music from the Billboard charts, the most identifiable part of each song & the clean versions.
Our goal is to consistently provide a fun, friendly & exciting environment while playing great music for you to enjoy!
If you love music bring your friends & family for the best way to ever play Bingo!
Musical Bingo is a game with the same concept as traditional bingo but instead of letters and numbers, they are replaced with song titles & artists. Players compete to win based on their knowledge of music and the unpredictability of the game. Mark your card when the DJ plays your song!
How To Play
– Look over the songs on your card
– The host will announce when the music round is starting
– Your job is to listen to what songs are playing. If you see that
song on your card, cross off the square
– Fill out 5 in a row (vertical, horizontal, diagonal), and yell BINGO!!
For more information check out our website:
www.MusicalBingoNation.com
Open Mic Night with Bryan Smith
Wed Aug 27th, - 7:00 pm - 10:00 pm
This is a night for musicians and music lovers alike! We’re launching Open Mic Night every other Wednesday on the main stage at 3 Daughters Brewing, hosted by St. Pete’s own Bryan Smith! The show takes place from 7-10 pm every other Wednesday. For those who just want to kick back and listen to local […]
Open Mic Night with Bryan Smith
Wed Aug 27th, - 7:00 pm - 10:00 pm
This is a night for musicians and music lovers alike!
We’re launching Open Mic Night every other Wednesday on the main stage at 3 Daughters Brewing, hosted by St. Pete’s own Bryan Smith! The show takes place from 7-10 pm every other Wednesday.
For those who just want to kick back and listen to local musicians do what they do best, just come on by, get a beer, and grab a table. It’s free to attend and open to all ages!
For individual musicians or small groups interested in performing, the signup sheet will go out at 6:30 pm, with individual sessions kicking off at 7 pm. All sound equipment will be provided, and both amateurs and professionals are invited to join the fun!
As always, the bar will have 42 taps flowing with award-winning craft beer, hard cider, spiked seltzer, wine, and sangria. Plus the kitchen is open until 9 pm, serving up some of the best burgers in St. Pete.

Tue Aug 26th, - 6:00 pm - 8:00 pm

That’s okay too—come support FLUFF and enjoy local raffle prizes, fun bidding, and great company. Whether you paint, sip, or simply show up to cheer us […]
Paint and Sip for Fluff Animal Rescue
Tue Aug 26th, - 6:00 pm - 8:00 pm
Sip, Paint & Paws! We’re so excited to spend the evening with our pawsome friends 3 Daughters Brewing!
Not into painting? No problem—come sip and socialize! Not into sipping? That’s okay too—come support FLUFF and enjoy local raffle prizes, fun bidding, and great company.
Whether you paint, sip, or simply show up to cheer us on, your presence makes a difference. Let’s raise a glass (or a brush) for rescue!
$40

90 Surge – 90’s Rock live!
Fri Aug 22nd, - 8:00 pm - 11:00 pm
Dust off your Doc Martens, ditch your smartphone and get ready— 90 SURGE is bringing a full blast of 90’s grunge and alt-rock energy! A true live rock experience!
All your childhood mix-tape songs in 1 LIVE SHOW!
Think Nirvana, Pearl Jam, Creed, Green Day, Foo Fighters, RHCP, Stone Temple Pilots, Collective Soul, and many more. We’ll even throw in a few ’80s and 2000s bangers too—because who made rules?

Food Truck Festival
Sun Aug 17th, - 12:00 pm - 6:00 pm
Everybody get your grub on! Our food truck festival is bringing half a dozen of the best food trucks in Tampa Bay to the brewery. These local stars are turning the brewery into a foodie paradise with tons of great specials and tantalizing dishes. Festivities are free to attend and open to all ages. In […]
Food Truck Festival
Sun Aug 17th, - 12:00 pm - 6:00 pm
Everybody get your grub on! Our food truck festival is bringing half a dozen of the best food trucks in Tampa Bay to the brewery.
These local stars are turning the brewery into a foodie paradise with tons of great specials and tantalizing dishes. Festivities are free to attend and open to all ages.
In addition to great food and award-winning beer, we will also have live music from 2-6 pm. And don’t worry: we have tons of indoor and shaded outdoor seating!
Participating food trucks include:
Naan Boti Chai Shai-
El Indio Tacos Y Snacks0-
Ibbi’s Q BBQ Truck-
Lolis Tacos-
Thai Gourmet Market-
Cousin’s Maine Lobster-
Bellie’s Street Food
See you soon – and come hungry!
IFPA Pinball Tournament
Sun Aug 17th, - 11:45 am - 1:45 pm
Get your flipper muscles ready – pinball is taking over the brewery! The flip frenzy IFPA Pinball Tournament is only $5 to join and open to all skill levels and ages. There will be no coin drops, with all machines at the brewery set to open play. The top four players will take home trophies, […]
IFPA Pinball Tournament
Sun Aug 17th, - 11:45 am - 1:45 pm
Get your flipper muscles ready – pinball is taking over the brewery!
The flip frenzy IFPA Pinball Tournament is only $5 to join and open to all skill levels and ages. There will be no coin drops, with all machines at the brewery set to open play.
The top four players will take home trophies, while prizes will be randomly given to participants throughout the festivities.
In addition to the pinball, stick around for live music starting at 2 pm, and of course plenty of great food and drink all afternoon!

Dueling Pianos is the ultimate, high-energy sing-along packed with great music, big laughs, and plenty of singing and dancing. Bring cash to make sure […]
Dueling Pianos
Fri Aug 15th, - 8:00 pm - 11:00 pm
New York, New York Dueling Pianos is back on stage at 3 Daughters Brewing! This is a show you don’t want to miss – coming Friday, August 15, from 8-11 pm.
Dueling Pianos is the ultimate, high-energy sing-along packed with great music, big laughs, and plenty of singing and dancing. Bring cash to make sure your song of choice gets played!
Plus, we’ll have fresh Maine lobster on site with Rockstar Lobster Food Truck!
*This is a free event with standing room only. We do not take reservations.*

Boozy Ice Cream Social for National Creamsicle Day
Thu Aug 14th, - 6:00 pm - 9:00 pm
We’re celebrating the best flavor in Tampa Bay! In honor of National Creamsicle Day, 3 Daughters Brewing is hosting a boozy ice cream social featuring our Orange Creamsicle Vodka+Soda and locally-made Churned Ice Cream. We’ll have our RetroChill Vodka+Sodas being served over ice cream, with the options of Orange Creamsicle, Root Beer Float, or Rocket […]
Boozy Ice Cream Social for National Creamsicle Day
Thu Aug 14th, - 6:00 pm - 9:00 pm
We’re celebrating the best flavor in Tampa Bay!
In honor of National Creamsicle Day, 3 Daughters Brewing is hosting a boozy ice cream social featuring our Orange Creamsicle Vodka+Soda and locally-made Churned Ice Cream.
We’ll have our RetroChill Vodka+Sodas being served over ice cream, with the options of Orange Creamsicle, Root Beer Float, or Rocket Pop! Guests can also skip the drink and just grab some ice cream to cool off, if they prefer.
And in a special debut, we’ll have boozy popsicles – alcoholic sweet treats made by Churned with our Orange Creamsicle Vodka+Soda!
Plus, we’ll have free Musical Bingo all night in the warehouse!
The ice cream social is open to all ages and free to attend. Guests must be 21+ to order anything with alcohol. Sodas and NA products also available, as well as our full kitchen menu.
Open Mic Night with Bryan Smith
Wed Aug 13th, - 7:00 pm - 10:00 pm
This is a night for musicians and music lovers alike! We’re launching Open Mic Night every other Wednesday on the main stage at 3 Daughters Brewing, hosted by St. Pete’s own Bryan Smith! The show takes place from 7-10 pm every other Wednesday. For those who just want to kick back and listen to local […]
Open Mic Night with Bryan Smith
Wed Aug 13th, - 7:00 pm - 10:00 pm
This is a night for musicians and music lovers alike!
We’re launching Open Mic Night every other Wednesday on the main stage at 3 Daughters Brewing, hosted by St. Pete’s own Bryan Smith! The show takes place from 7-10 pm every other Wednesday.
For those who just want to kick back and listen to local musicians do what they do best, just come on by, get a beer, and grab a table. It’s free to attend and open to all ages!
For individual musicians or small groups interested in performing, the signup sheet will go out at 6:30 pm, with individual sessions kicking off at 7 pm. All sound equipment will be provided, and both amateurs and professionals are invited to join the fun!
As always, the bar will have 42 taps flowing with award-winning craft beer, hard cider, spiked seltzer, wine, and sangria. Plus the kitchen is open until 9 pm, serving up some of the best burgers in St. Pete!
Bonsai & Brews
Wed Aug 13th, - 7:00 pm - 9:00 pm
Join Thunderstruck Bonsai for a fun and creative evening at 3 Daughters Brewing in St. Pete! Create your own bonsai tree with local bonsai artists while sipping on delicious craft beer. No experience needed – just bring your creativity! At Bonsai & Brews, you’ll have the opportunity to grab a brew and create your own […]
Bonsai & Brews
Wed Aug 13th, - 7:00 pm - 9:00 pm
Join Thunderstruck Bonsai for a fun and creative evening at 3 Daughters Brewing in St. Pete! Create your own bonsai tree with local bonsai artists while sipping on delicious craft beer. No experience needed – just bring your creativity!
At Bonsai & Brews, you’ll have the opportunity to grab a brew and create your own bonsai with guidance from local bonsai artists. We’ll start with the basics of bonsai, then dive into the process: choose a ceramic pot and a pre-bonsai tree, and get ready to re-pot, prune, and shape your own bonsai masterpiece. All while enjoying delicious craft beer and food from 3 Daughters Brewing.
Known for its vibrant atmosphere, exceptional craft beers, and tasty food offerings, 3 Daughters Brewing is one of Florida’s largest independent breweries, and it’s the perfect place to relax, and create.
Each Ticket Includes:
– A tropical species pre-bonsai tree
– Ceramic glazed bonsai pottery
– Instructions to style and care for your new bonsai tree
– Wire, bonsai soil, and substrate
– Use of all necessary tools provided
– Aftercare instructions and guidance
Seating is limited, so book your
tickets
today and don’t miss out on this fun and creative event!

Boots & Brews Country Line Dancing
Thu Aug 7th, - 7:00 pm - 10:00 pm
Join us on the first Thursday of every month at 7 PM for a great night of Boots and Brews at 3 Daughters Brewery.
Instructor Kate has been teaching country line dancing for 6+ years for both partner and individual dance lessons and is bringing her expertise to the brewery!
She will be teaching lessons as the DJ plays an array of fun music like, “Beer Money”, “Drinkin’ Beer”, “I Like Beer”, “Beers Ago”, “Beer for my Horses” and dozens of other beer drinking country songs!
So let’s do it! Round up the crew and come get your county dance on!
This is a free event, open to all ages.

Books & Brews: Pop-Up + Book Swap
Sat Aug 2nd, - 12:00 pm - 2:00 pm
Excited to share our latest Book Swap & Pop-Up at 3 Daughters! Bring a book, find a new favorite, and sip while you swap. Join us Saturday, August 2 from 12–2PM at 3 Daughters Brewing in St. Pete (222 22nd St. S). Books, brews and bookish goodies await—don’t miss it! How Our Book Swap Works:1. […]
Books & Brews: Pop-Up + Book Swap
Sat Aug 2nd, - 12:00 pm - 2:00 pm
Excited to share our latest Book Swap & Pop-Up at 3 Daughters! Bring a book, find a new favorite, and sip while you swap. Join us Saturday, August 2 from 12–2PM at 3 Daughters Brewing in St. Pete (222 22nd St. S). Books, brews and bookish goodies await—don’t miss it!
How Our Book Swap Works:
1. Bring a Book You Love: Choose a gently used book that you’ve enjoyed—whether it’s a recent favorite or a timeless classic. If you’d recommend it to a friend, it’s perfect for swapping! (We kindly ask: no beat-up or unwanted books.)
2. Swap for Something New-to-You: You’ll get a swap ticket when you arrive, which you can exchange for a used gem from someone else. Don’t see your ideal read right away? Sip a drink, grab a snack, and hang out while new books arrive.
3. Browse Our Curated Collection: Explore hand-picked titles, goods, and bookish treasures available for purchase. Every buy helps us learn what you love—and supports our dream of opening a local indie bookshop right here in St. Pete!
4. Enter to Win Craft Beverages: For every purchase you make, you’ll be entered to win a 3 Daughters Brewing 6-pack on us!
5. Share Your Bookish Finds: Tag us in your post (“Banyan Books” on Facebook and @shopbanyan on Instagram) to show off what you swapped.
Have more questions about how it works? Check out the “Discussion” tab and scroll below to view our FAQs—or ask questions of your own!
We hope to see you there, and check out
www.shopbanyan.com
for future events, ways to shop and more about us!

Paint Your Own Pottery
Wed Jul 30th, - 6:00 pm - 9:00 pm
Paint your own pottery at 3 Daughters Brewing with The Clay Co-op!
We provide you with a ready-to-paint piece of pottery and all the supplies you need. Get creative and paint your heart out! Following the event, your work will be fired in the kiln at The Clay Co-op and everything will be food safe, microwave safe, and dishwasher safe!
Your pieces will be ready to pick up at The Clay Co-op 1-2 weeks following the event. The Clay Co-op is located at 2724 6th Ave S., St. Petersburg, FL. Shipping options available.
$40

EVENTS
Stop by for a Hand Crafted Beer & A SHOW
For us, it's not enough just to brew great beer. We want to enjoy that beer with our friends and celebrate the good times with our community. That's why we take advantage of all the space available to us at our brewery and use it for everything from trivia, yoga and bingo during the week, to live music, festivals and markets on the weekends. Whatever your preference, we've always got something going on in our Tasting Room.

With over 30 music rounds, you will always have a new one to try. We play the best music from the […]
Musical Bingo Nation
Thu Aug 28th, - 7:00 pm - 9:00 pm
Join us for Musical Bingo at 3 Daughters Brewing
Free To Play
Win Prizes
Fun For Everyone
Musical Bingo Nation is an entertainment company that provides musical bingo events throughout Florida & New England. With over 30 music rounds, you will always have a new one to try. We play the best music from the Billboard charts, the most identifiable part of each song & the clean versions.
Our goal is to consistently provide a fun, friendly & exciting environment while playing great music for you to enjoy!
If you love music bring your friends & family for the best way to ever play Bingo!
Musical Bingo is a game with the same concept as traditional bingo but instead of letters and numbers, they are replaced with song titles & artists. Players compete to win based on their knowledge of music and the unpredictability of the game. Mark your card when the DJ plays your song!
How To Play
– Look over the songs on your card
– The host will announce when the music round is starting
– Your job is to listen to what songs are playing. If you see that
song on your card, cross off the square
– Fill out 5 in a row (vertical, horizontal, diagonal), and yell BINGO!!
For more information check out our website:
www.MusicalBingoNation.com

Open Mic Night with Bryan Smith
Wed Aug 27th, - 7:00 pm - 10:00 pm
This is a night for musicians and music lovers alike!
We’re launching Open Mic Night every other Wednesday on the main stage at 3 Daughters Brewing, hosted by St. Pete’s own Bryan Smith! The show takes place from 7-10 pm every other Wednesday.
For those who just want to kick back and listen to local musicians do what they do best, just come on by, get a beer, and grab a table. It’s free to attend and open to all ages!
For individual musicians or small groups interested in performing, the signup sheet will go out at 6:30 pm, with individual sessions kicking off at 7 pm. All sound equipment will be provided, and both amateurs and professionals are invited to join the fun!
As always, the bar will have 42 taps flowing with award-winning craft beer, hard cider, spiked seltzer, wine, and sangria. Plus the kitchen is open until 9 pm, serving up some of the best burgers in St. Pete.

Not into painting? No problem—come sip and socialize! Not into sipping? That’s okay too—come support FLUFF and enjoy local raffle prizes, fun bidding, and great company.
Whether you paint, sip, or simply show up to cheer us on, your presence makes a difference. Let’s raise a glass (or a brush) for rescue!

Food Truck Festival
Sun Aug 17th, - 12:00 pm - 6:00 pm
Everybody get your grub on! Our food truck festival is bringing half a dozen of the best food trucks in Tampa Bay to the brewery.
These local stars are turning the brewery into a foodie paradise with tons of great specials and tantalizing dishes. Festivities are free to attend and open to all ages.
In addition to great food and award-winning beer, we will also have live music from 2-6 pm. And don’t worry: we have tons of indoor and shaded outdoor seating!
Participating food trucks include:
Naan Boti Chai Shai-
El Indio Tacos Y Snacks0-
Ibbi’s Q BBQ Truck-
Lolis Tacos-
Thai Gourmet Market-
Cousin’s Maine Lobster-
Bellie’s Street Food
See you soon – and come hungry!

IFPA Pinball Tournament
Sun Aug 17th, - 11:45 am - 1:45 pm
Get your flipper muscles ready – pinball is taking over the brewery!
The flip frenzy IFPA Pinball Tournament is only $5 to join and open to all skill levels and ages. There will be no coin drops, with all machines at the brewery set to open play.
The top four players will take home trophies, while prizes will be randomly given to participants throughout the festivities.
In addition to the pinball, stick around for live music starting at 2 pm, and of course plenty of great food and drink all afternoon!

Boozy Ice Cream Social for National Creamsicle Day
Thu Aug 14th, - 6:00 pm - 9:00 pm

We’ll have our RetroChill Vodka+Sodas being served over ice cream, with the options of Orange Creamsicle, Root Beer Float, or Rocket […]
Boozy Ice Cream Social for National Creamsicle Day
Thu Aug 14th, - 6:00 pm - 9:00 pm
We’re celebrating the best flavor in Tampa Bay!
In honor of National Creamsicle Day, 3 Daughters Brewing is hosting a boozy ice cream social featuring our Orange Creamsicle Vodka+Soda and locally-made Churned Ice Cream.
We’ll have our RetroChill Vodka+Sodas being served over ice cream, with the options of Orange Creamsicle, Root Beer Float, or Rocket Pop! Guests can also skip the drink and just grab some ice cream to cool off, if they prefer.
And in a special debut, we’ll have boozy popsicles – alcoholic sweet treats made by Churned with our Orange Creamsicle Vodka+Soda!
Plus, we’ll have free Musical Bingo all night in the warehouse!
The ice cream social is open to all ages and free to attend. Guests must be 21+ to order anything with alcohol. Sodas and NA products also available, as well as our full kitchen menu.

Open Mic Night with Bryan Smith
Wed Aug 13th, - 7:00 pm - 10:00 pm
This is a night for musicians and music lovers alike!
We’re launching Open Mic Night every other Wednesday on the main stage at 3 Daughters Brewing, hosted by St. Pete’s own Bryan Smith! The show takes place from 7-10 pm every other Wednesday.
For those who just want to kick back and listen to local musicians do what they do best, just come on by, get a beer, and grab a table. It’s free to attend and open to all ages!
For individual musicians or small groups interested in performing, the signup sheet will go out at 6:30 pm, with individual sessions kicking off at 7 pm. All sound equipment will be provided, and both amateurs and professionals are invited to join the fun!
As always, the bar will have 42 taps flowing with award-winning craft beer, hard cider, spiked seltzer, wine, and sangria. Plus the kitchen is open until 9 pm, serving up some of the best burgers in St. Pete!
Bonsai & Brews
Wed Aug 13th, - 7:00 pm - 9:00 pm
Join Thunderstruck Bonsai for a fun and creative evening at 3 Daughters Brewing in St. Pete! Create your own bonsai tree with local bonsai artists while sipping on delicious craft beer. No experience needed – just bring your creativity! At Bonsai & Brews, you’ll have the opportunity to grab a brew and create your own […]
Bonsai & Brews
Wed Aug 13th, - 7:00 pm - 9:00 pm
Join Thunderstruck Bonsai for a fun and creative evening at 3 Daughters Brewing in St. Pete! Create your own bonsai tree with local bonsai artists while sipping on delicious craft beer. No experience needed – just bring your creativity!
At Bonsai & Brews, you’ll have the opportunity to grab a brew and create your own bonsai with guidance from local bonsai artists. We’ll start with the basics of bonsai, then dive into the process: choose a ceramic pot and a pre-bonsai tree, and get ready to re-pot, prune, and shape your own bonsai masterpiece. All while enjoying delicious craft beer and food from 3 Daughters Brewing.
Known for its vibrant atmosphere, exceptional craft beers, and tasty food offerings, 3 Daughters Brewing is one of Florida’s largest independent breweries, and it’s the perfect place to relax, and create.
Each Ticket Includes:
– A tropical species pre-bonsai tree
– Ceramic glazed bonsai pottery
– Instructions to style and care for your new bonsai tree
– Wire, bonsai soil, and substrate
– Use of all necessary tools provided
– Aftercare instructions and guidance
Seating is limited, so book your
tickets
today and don’t miss out on this fun and creative event!

Boots & Brews Country Line Dancing
Thu Aug 7th, - 7:00 pm - 10:00 pm
Join us on the first Thursday of every month at 7 PM for a great night of Boots and Brews at 3 Daughters Brewery.
Instructor Kate has been teaching country line dancing for 6+ years for both partner and individual dance lessons and is bringing her expertise to the brewery!
She will be teaching lessons as the DJ plays an array of fun music like, “Beer Money”, “Drinkin’ Beer”, “I Like Beer”, “Beers Ago”, “Beer for my Horses” and dozens of other beer drinking country songs!
So let’s do it! Round up the crew and come get your county dance on!
This is a free event, open to all ages.

Team Trivia
Mon Aug 4th, - 7:00 pm - 9:00 pm
8/4/2025 | 7:00p.m. – 9:00p.m.
Come out to 3 Daughters Brewing in St. Petersburg, Florida and shake off the Monday blahs and play the 2017 Creative Loafing Readers Poll Award-Winning Monday Night Trivia Game!
Great selection of 3 Daughters craft beers, ciders and hard seltzers as well as a great selection of food.
Top 3 teams every Monday win a $30, $20 or $10 gift card to use at your next visit to the brewery!

Books & Brews: Pop-Up + Book Swap
Sat Aug 2nd, - 12:00 pm - 2:00 pm
Excited to share our latest Book Swap & Pop-Up at 3 Daughters! Bring a book, find a new favorite, and sip while you swap. Join us Saturday, August 2 from 12–2PM at 3 Daughters Brewing in St. Pete (222 22nd St. S). Books, brews and bookish goodies await—don’t miss it!
How Our Book Swap Works:
1. Bring a Book You Love: Choose a gently used book that you’ve enjoyed—whether it’s a recent favorite or a timeless classic. If you’d recommend it to a friend, it’s perfect for swapping! (We kindly ask: no beat-up or unwanted books.)
2. Swap for Something New-to-You: You’ll get a swap ticket when you arrive, which you can exchange for a used gem from someone else. Don’t see your ideal read right away? Sip a drink, grab a snack, and hang out while new books arrive.
3. Browse Our Curated Collection: Explore hand-picked titles, goods, and bookish treasures available for purchase. Every buy helps us learn what you love—and supports our dream of opening a local indie bookshop right here in St. Pete!
4. Enter to Win Craft Beverages: For every purchase you make, you’ll be entered to win a 3 Daughters Brewing 6-pack on us!
5. Share Your Bookish Finds: Tag us in your post (“Banyan Books” on Facebook and @shopbanyan on Instagram) to show off what you swapped.
Have more questions about how it works? Check out the “Discussion” tab and scroll below to view our FAQs—or ask questions of your own!
We hope to see you there, and check out
www.shopbanyan.com
for future events, ways to shop and more about us!

Paint Your Own Pottery
Wed Jul 30th, - 6:00 pm - 9:00 pm
Paint your own pottery at 3 Daughters Brewing with The Clay Co-op!
We provide you with a ready-to-paint piece of pottery and all the supplies you need. Get creative and paint your heart out! Following the event, your work will be fired in the kiln at The Clay Co-op and everything will be food safe, microwave safe, and dishwasher safe!
Your pieces will be ready to pick up at The Clay Co-op 1-2 weeks following the event. The Clay Co-op is located at 2724 6th Ave S., St. Petersburg, FL. Shipping options available.
$40
